advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This digital notepad and PDF markup tool covers all the bases. Create notes with your keyboard or Apple Pencil: the app transforms your hand-drawn shapes into perfect ones, and can even convert your handwriting to text.
editorialNotes.short: Go paperless with ease and enjoy the handwriting recognition feature.

ios.subtitle: Create a Resume, Essay or PDF

editorialNotes.standard: Create, edit, and view your documents on the go, and access them anytime from your device with this powerful wordsmithing app. Work from anywhere and let your work go everywhere you do.
editorialNotes.short: Create, edit and view your documents from your iPhone or iPad.

ios.subtitle: AI Note Taking and Study Help

editorialNotes.standard: We rely on this sleek, powerful notetaker to annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations, and more. With built-in iCloud support, it’s perfect for keeping notes, documents and doodles up to date across devices.
editorialNotes.short: Annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations and more.

editorialNotes.standard: Whether you are tracking personal finances or you're a power spreadsheet user, Microsoft Excel will make compiling and visualizing data sleek and easy. Create workbooks and worksheets, use formulas and see your work in graphs with this powerful spreadsheet application.
editorialNotes.short: Create, edit and share your files from your iPhone or iPad.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Manage your mail efficiently and never miss an important event.
Create, present and share your slides from your iPhone or iPad.
editorialNotes.standard: Need to create a high-impact presentation? Create, present and share your slides and polished decks with PowerPoint. Whether you are in the classroom, boardroom or home office, this tool can help you create high-quality presentations that look like they were designed by a professional.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Work at home or on the go
editorialNotes.standard: Here’s a simple truth: We don’t work with documents on mobile the same way we do on desktop. So it makes sense that Microsoft reimagined Office for a uniquely mobile experience where being productive feels frictionless.

editorialNotes.short: Ditch your paper notebook for digital notes that can be easily searched, organised, and shared.

editorialNotes.standard: Give your brain a break with this digital notepad for logging your thoughts. Create private pages for lists, diaries, and random thoughts, or shared ones to collaborate with friends and colleagues.

ios.subtitle: Fast x Secure Best Hotspot VPN

name: DeepSeek - AI Assistant
artistName: 杭州深度求索人工智能基础技术研究有限公司

editorialNotes.short: Draw, paint and doodle as you like. Works great with Apple Pencil, too.
editorialNotes.tagline: Sketch and doodle on the go

editorialNotes.standard: Ingeniously designed, Paper presents a powerfully modern tool for writing, drawing, note-taking and beyond. Sketch out ideas and whip up diagrams with a rich selection of responsive brushes. Using simple gestures, quickly annotate photos or transform text into beautifully formatted lists. It’s an excellent medium for capturing and organising the thoughts and images that you need every day.
editorialNotes.short: A powerfully-modern tool for writing, drawing, note-taking, and beyond.

editorialNotes.standard: Equal parts task manager and calendar, this app has helped us build a schedule that’s as productive as it is practical. And with apps for Apple Watch and Mac, it can help keep you on track wherever you go.

Makes organizing files and revising PDFs as simple as using a word processor. With support for reading files from popular productivity suites, it’s a convenient way to take the office anywhere you go.
editorialNotes.short: Organise, annotate and edit your PDF library, and take your office anywhere.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Keep a handwritten journal and collaborate with friends.

editorialNotes.standard: A best-in-class handwriting experience. Extensive customization, from paper and pen types to templates completely change the way we take notes.

editorialNotes.tagline: All your files in one place
editorialNotes.standard: For all its usefulness, the thing we appreciate most about this cloud-storage app is how little we have to think about it. Whatever we’re sharing or uploading, it all just works–seamlessly and effortlessly.
editorialNotes.short: All your files are safe in one place across all your devices.

editorialNotes.standard: With your iPad and Apple Pencil, design complex 3D models–no desk, mouse, or keyboard needed. The ability to work offline means you’ll be able to sketch and design from anywhere.

editorialNotes.standard: 3M Company’s free app is a terrific solution for organizing and preserving real-world Post-it notes. It’s incredibly easy to use: just snap an image of your notes, then arrange them however you like on virtual boards—or quickly share notes via email or social media.

Lecture to follow? Novel to write? Project to plan? Getting organised has never been easier! Jot down your thoughts, make a to-do-list, annotate a PDF document - it’s quick and simple to get things in order with Evernote. And the best part? All your notes sync between your devices, meaning you can stay on top of things wherever you are!
editorialNotes.short: Stay on top of your tasks wherever you are.
